column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=When I bake a cake , it is usually for a birthday .
#id=2
#text=When I am baking a cake , I find a good recipe online with good reviews and make sure that I have all of the ingredients needed .
#id=3
#text=I take all of the ingredients out and then I preheat the oven .
#id=4
#text=I find the appropriate pans needed and make sure they are clean .
#id=5
#text=Then I grease and flour the pans and add parchment paper to the bottom .
#id=6
#text=Next , I will measure and combine all of the dry ingredients , sifting if necessary .
#id=7
#text=Then I combine the wet ingredients after measuring them and wisk together .
#id=8
#text=Lastly , I combine the wet and dry gently and stir as little as possible before pouring into the pans and placing into the oven , taking note of the time I need to take them back out .
#id=9
#text=Once baked , I will cool the cakes and frost , either with canned frosting or homemade frosting .
#text=At the very end I will decorate the cake since it is probably for a birthday .
